name: Public-DNS.org - DNS Manager
short_description: Public-DNS.org is a multi-user web based DNS management system. It is the software behind the http://www.Public-DNS.org free public dns service. Great for ISP's and service providers as an extra service to offer their clients, but can be used by anyone.
